inclusion.criterion: Newly documented POAF of more than 5 minute duration
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: cardiac surgery during index hospitalization, including (CABG, valvular replacement or repair, a combination) without Maze procedure
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Sinus rhythm at the time of BioMonitor implantation or definite intention to cardiovert prior to discharge
inclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: History of atrial fibrillation/flutter prior to cardiac surgery
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Dual chamber pacemaker or ICD implanted or planned
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Another (non-AF) indication for long term anticoagulation
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Inability to attend scheduled, periodic office visits for follow-up
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has history of CAD and prior MI, HLD, HTN, ventricular tachycardia, and syncope. He was recently discharged after a negative work-up for syncope which included the implantation of a cardiac monitoring device.
